name: listportfolios
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trader_wagon.
Tool description: Trader Wagon API is specially designed to obtain traders' positions (portfolio).
API description: Fetches a list of portfolios from the Trader Wagon API based on the given parameters.

limit.description: The number of results to return. Default is 10.

portfoliotype.description: The type of portfolio to filter by. Default is None.

available.description: Specifies whether to list only available portfolios. Default is 0.
